spec.name: Zaouiya Sidi Maarouf
spec.description: Zaouiya Sidi Maarouf is a local spiritual center associated with the Sidi Maarouf saint, serving as a hub for a specific Sufi or religious fraternity in the neighborhood. It facilitates spiritual retreats, religious study, and communal support for its members.

people.comment: The saint after whom the area is named.

access.comment: Access is generally restricted to members or with prior permission.
